question_text: A user sets their display to 3840x2160 on a 4K monitor, but interface elements appear unreadably small. Which combination of settings would preserve sharpness and improve usability?
answer_options: Keep native resolution and increase display scaling to 200%
correct_answer: Keep native resolution and increase display scaling to 200%
explanation: Retaining the native resolution ensures sharp visuals, while 200% scaling increases UI size for readability without sacrificing clarity.
